AddOnStorageValue.Name: Joomla_Second Order SQL Injection
AddOnStorageValue.Value: { "Id": "72fd9b4a-1d21-4275-9a41-565e0458d492", "Application": "Joomla", "AffectedVersions": [ "3.7.0-3.8.3" ], "VulnerabilityName": "Second Order SQL Injection", "ExternalReferer": "CVE-2018-6376", "Impact": "Critical", "Note": "An attacker exploiting this vulnerability can read arbitrary data from the database. This data can be used to further extend the permissions of the attacker and gaining full administrative privileges." }
